summary: The Power Of Orion And Xenus
descriptionHtml:
Orion

This Mod Adds The Spellbook \'\'The Book Of Orion\'\'.
It Can Be Made At The Tanningrack.
You Need A Burned Book And A Daedra Heart To Make This.
This Book Learns A New Spell.
With This Spell The Powerful Orion Can Be Summoned
For 8 Minutes He Can Guide You In Battle.
You Can Always Summon Him Again.
Orion Doesnt Speak Much, He Only Fights And Protects.

Xenus

This Mod Adds The Spellbook \'\'The Book Of Xenus\'\'.
It Can Be Made At The Tanningrack.
You Need A Burned Book And A Daedra Heart To Make This.
This Book Learns A New Spell.
With This Spell The Powerful Xenus Can Be Summoned
For 8 Minutes She Can Guide You In Battle.
You Can Always Summon Her Again.
Xenus Doesnt Speak Much, She Only Fights And Protects.

How To Install: Put The File And Maps In The Skyrim Data Folder.
author: JP0005
